title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1203/97 of 27 June 1997 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1445/76 specifying the different varieties of Lolium perenne L.
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1203/97 of 27 June 1997 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1445/76 specifying the different varieties of Lolium perenne L.
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annexes I and II to Regulation (EEC) No 1445/76 are hereby replaced by the Annexes to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 July 1997.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 June 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 246, 5. 11. 1971, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 349, 31. 12. 1994, p. 105.
(3) OJ No L 161, 23. 6. 1976, p. 10.
(4) OJ No L 148, 21. 6. 1996, p. 11.
